  • Method Details

    • jsonLines

      AggregateJsonFilesImporter.ReadJsonFilesOptions jsonLines(boolean value)
      Parameters:
      value - set to true to read JSON Lines files. Defaults to reading files that either contain an array of JSON objects or a single JSON object.
